• Rust: Forged from Blood and Iron in the Fires of Hell

The Rust Forge

This site contains supplementary documentation useful to the members of The Rust Project.

  • User groups.

  • Release history. Links to previous release artifacts.

  • Platform support.

  • Friend of the Tree archives.

  • IDE initiative. Ongoing work into improving IDE support for Rust.

  • Bibliography. Research papers and other links to projects that influenced Rust. Papers about Rust.

  • Release process. How to make releases of Rust.

  • The Rust test suite.

  • Bots, websites and infrastructure. A catalog of the IRC bots, websites and other infrastructure used by the project, what they do, and who maintains them (i.e. who to contact when they malfunction and go on a bot rampage).
